trans-unit.source: Smooth Streaming Plugin for the Open Source Media Framework
trans-unit.target: Smooth Streaming Plugin for the Open Source Media Framework

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the Azure Media Services Smooth Streaming plugin for the Adobe Open Source Media Framework.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the Azure Media Services Smooth Streaming plugin for the Adobe Open Source Media Framework.

trans-unit.source: How to Use the Microsoft Smooth Streaming Plugin for the Adobe Open Source Media Framework
trans-unit.target: How to Use the Microsoft Smooth Streaming Plugin for the Adobe Open Source Media Framework

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Smooth Streaming plugin for Open Source Media Framework 2.0 (SS for OSMF) extends the default capabilities of OSMF and adds Microsoft Smooth Streaming content playback to new and existing OSMF players.
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft Smooth Streaming plugin for Open Source Media Framework 2.0 (SS for OSMF) extends the default capabilities of OSMF and adds Microsoft Smooth Streaming content playback to new and existing OSMF players.

trans-unit.source: The plugin also adds Smooth Streaming playback capabilities to Strobe Media Playback (SMP).
trans-unit.target: The plugin also adds Smooth Streaming playback capabilities to Strobe Media Playback (SMP).

trans-unit.source: SS for OSMF includes two versions of plugin:
trans-unit.target: SS for OSMF includes two versions of plugin:

trans-unit.source: Static Smooth Streaming plugin for OSMF (.swc)
trans-unit.target: Static Smooth Streaming plugin for OSMF (.swc)

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Smooth Streaming plugin for OSMF (.swf)
trans-unit.target: Dynamic Smooth Streaming plugin for OSMF (.swf)

trans-unit.source: This document assumes that the reader has a general working knowledge of OSMF and OSMF plug-ins.
trans-unit.target: This document assumes that the reader has a general working knowledge of OSMF and OSMF plug-ins.

trans-unit.source: For more information about OSMF, please see the documentation on the [official OSMF site](http://osmf.org/).
trans-unit.target: For more information about OSMF, please see the documentation on the [official OSMF site](http://osmf.org/).

trans-unit.source: Smooth Streaming plugin for OSMF 2.0
trans-unit.target: Smooth Streaming plugin for OSMF 2.0

trans-unit.source: The plugin supports loading and playback of on-demand Smooth Streaming content with the following features:
trans-unit.target: The plugin supports loading and playback of on-demand Smooth Streaming content with the following features:

trans-unit.source: On-demand Smooth Streaming playback (Play, Pause, Seek, Stop)
trans-unit.target: On-demand Smooth Streaming playback (Play, Pause, Seek, Stop)

trans-unit.source: Live Smooth Streaming playback (Play)
trans-unit.target: Live Smooth Streaming playback (Play)

trans-unit.source: Live DVR functions (Pause, Seek, DVR Playback, Go-to-Live)
trans-unit.target: Live DVR functions (Pause, Seek, DVR Playback, Go-to-Live)

trans-unit.source: Support for video codecs - H.264
trans-unit.target: Support for video codecs - H.264

trans-unit.source: Support for Audio codecs - AAC
trans-unit.target: Support for Audio codecs - AAC

trans-unit.source: Multiple audio language switching with OSMF built-in APIs
trans-unit.target: Multiple audio language switching with OSMF built-in APIs

trans-unit.source: Max playback quality selection with OSMF built-in APIs
trans-unit.target: Max playback quality selection with OSMF built-in APIs

trans-unit.source: Sidecar closed captions with OSMF captions plugin
trans-unit.target: Sidecar closed captions with OSMF captions plugin

trans-unit.source: Adobe® Flash® Player 11.4 or higher.
trans-unit.target: Adobe® Flash® Player 11.4 or higher.

trans-unit.source: This version only supports OSMF 2.0.
trans-unit.target: This version only supports OSMF 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Supported features and known issues
trans-unit.target: Supported features and known issues

trans-unit.source: For a full list of supported features, unsupported features and known issues, refer to [this document](http://download.microsoft.com/download/3/1/B/31B63D97-574E-4A8D-BF8D-170744181724/Smooth_Streaming_Plugin_for_OSMF.pdf).
trans-unit.target: For a full list of supported features, unsupported features and known issues, refer to [this document](http://download.microsoft.com/download/3/1/B/31B63D97-574E-4A8D-BF8D-170744181724/Smooth_Streaming_Plugin_for_OSMF.pdf).

trans-unit.source: Loading the Plugin
trans-unit.target: Loading the Plugin

trans-unit.source: OSMF plugins can be loaded statically (at compile time) or dynamically (at run-time).
trans-unit.target: OSMF plugins can be loaded statically (at compile time) or dynamically (at run-time).

trans-unit.source: The Smooth Streaming plugin for OSMF download includes both dynamic and static versions.
trans-unit.target: The Smooth Streaming plugin for OSMF download includes both dynamic and static versions.

trans-unit.source: Static loading: To load statically, a static library (SWC) file is required.
trans-unit.target: Static loading: To load statically, a static library (SWC) file is required.

trans-unit.source: Static plugins are added as a reference to the projects and merge inside the final output file at the compile time.
trans-unit.target: Static plugins are added as a reference to the projects and merge inside the final output file at the compile time.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic loading: To load dynamically, a precompiled (SWF) file is required.
trans-unit.target: Dynamic loading: To load dynamically, a precompiled (SWF) file is required.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic plugins are loaded in the runtime and not included in the project output.
trans-unit.target: Dynamic plugins are loaded in the runtime and not included in the project output.

trans-unit.source: (Compiled output) Dynamic plugins can be loaded using HTTP and FILE protocols.
trans-unit.target: (Compiled output) Dynamic plugins can be loaded using HTTP and FILE protocols.

trans-unit.source: For more information on static and dynamic loading, see the official [OSMF plugin page](http://osmf.org/dev/osmf/OtherPDFs/osmf_plugin_dev_guide.pdf).
trans-unit.target: For more information on static and dynamic loading, see the official [OSMF plugin page](http://osmf.org/dev/osmf/OtherPDFs/osmf_plugin_dev_guide.pdf).

trans-unit.source: SS for OSMF Static Loading
trans-unit.target: SS for OSMF Static Loading

trans-unit.source: The code snippet below shows how to load the SS plugin for OSMF statically and play a basic video using OSMF MediaFactory class.
trans-unit.target: The code snippet below shows how to load the SS plugin for OSMF statically and play a basic video using OSMF MediaFactory class.

trans-unit.source: Before including the SS for OSMF code, please ensure that the project reference includes the "MSAdaptiveStreamingPlugin-v1.0.3-osmf2.0.swc" static plugin.
trans-unit.target: Before including the SS for OSMF code, please ensure that the project reference includes the "MSAdaptiveStreamingPlugin-v1.0.3-osmf2.0.swc" static plugin.

trans-unit.source: SS for OSMF Dynamic Loading
trans-unit.target: SS for OSMF Dynamic Loading

trans-unit.source: The code snippet below shows how to load the SS plugin for OSMF dynamically and play a basic video using the OSMF MediaFactory class.
trans-unit.target: The code snippet below shows how to load the SS plugin for OSMF dynamically and play a basic video using the OSMF MediaFactory class.

trans-unit.source: Before including the SS for OSMF code, copy the "MSAdaptiveStreamingPlugin-v1.0.3-osmf2.0.swf" dynamic plugin to the project folder if you want to load using FILE protocol, or copy under a web server for HTTP load.
trans-unit.target: Before including the SS for OSMF code, copy the "MSAdaptiveStreamingPlugin-v1.0.3-osmf2.0.swf" dynamic plugin to the project folder if you want to load using FILE protocol, or copy under a web server for HTTP load.

trans-unit.source: There is no need to include "MSAdaptiveStreamingPlugin-v1.0.3-osmf2.0.swc" in the project references.
trans-unit.target: There is no need to include "MSAdaptiveStreamingPlugin-v1.0.3-osmf2.0.swc" in the project references.

trans-unit.source: Strobe Media Playback with the SS ODMF Dynamic Plugin
trans-unit.target: Strobe Media Playback with the SS ODMF Dynamic Plugin

trans-unit.source: The Smooth Streaming for OSMF dynamic plugin is compatible with [Strobe Media Playback (SMP)](http://osmf.org/strobe_mediaplayback.html).
trans-unit.target: The Smooth Streaming for OSMF dynamic plugin is compatible with [Strobe Media Playback (SMP)](http://osmf.org/strobe_mediaplayback.html).

trans-unit.source: You can use the SS for OSMF plugin to add Smooth Streaming content playback to SMP.
trans-unit.target: You can use the SS for OSMF plugin to add Smooth Streaming content playback to SMP.

trans-unit.source: To do this, copy "MSAdaptiveStreamingPlugin-v1.0.3-osmf2.0.swf" under a web server for HTTP load using the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To do this, copy "MSAdaptiveStreamingPlugin-v1.0.3-osmf2.0.swf" under a web server for HTTP load using the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Browse the [Strobe Media Playback setup page](http://osmf.org/dev/2.0gm/setup.html).
trans-unit.target: Browse the [Strobe Media Playback setup page](http://osmf.org/dev/2.0gm/setup.html).

trans-unit.source: Set the src to a Smooth Streaming source, (e.g. http://devplatem.vo.msecnd.net/Sintel/Sintel_H264.ism/manifest)
trans-unit.target: Set the src to a Smooth Streaming source, (e.g. http://devplatem.vo.msecnd.net/Sintel/Sintel_H264.ism/manifest)

trans-unit.source: Make the desired configuration changes and click Preview and Update.
trans-unit.target: Make the desired configuration changes and click Preview and Update.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Your content web server needs a valid crossdomain.xml.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Your content web server needs a valid crossdomain.xml.

trans-unit.source: Copy and paste the code to a simple HTML page using your favorite text editor, such as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Copy and paste the code to a simple HTML page using your favorite text editor, such as in the following example:

trans-unit.source: Add Smooth Streaming OSMF plugin to the embed code and save.
trans-unit.target: Add Smooth Streaming OSMF plugin to the embed code and save.

trans-unit.source: Save your HTML page and publish to a web server.
trans-unit.target: Save your HTML page and publish to a web server.

trans-unit.source: Browse to the published web page using your favorite Flash® Player enabled Internet browser (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, so on).
trans-unit.target: Browse to the published web page using your favorite Flash® Player enabled Internet browser (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, so on).

trans-unit.source: Enjoy Smooth Streaming content inside Adobe® Flash® Player.
trans-unit.target: Enjoy Smooth Streaming content inside Adobe® Flash® Player.

trans-unit.source: For more information on general OSMF development, please see the official [OSMF development page](http://osmf.org/resources.html).
trans-unit.target: For more information on general OSMF development, please see the official [OSMF development page](http://osmf.org/resources.html).

trans-unit.target: See Also
